author: davidlt
body:
- Build glibc from cms-externals/glibc.
- Change package version to match EL6 package version.
- Keep current DTV expansion on dlopen() patch

The following was reported as not working with older glibc version:

```
SCRAM_ARCH=slc6_amd64_gcc491
cmsRun $CMSSW_RELEASE_BASE/src/Fireworks/Geometry/python/dumpSimGeometry_cfg.py tag=2015
```

Signed-off-by: David Abdurachmanov David.Abdurachmanov@cern.ch
title: glibc: update to resolve TLS initialization issue
